DOC.brief_title: Once-Daily Investigational Nasal Spray In Adults And Adolescents With Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis ( SAR )
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled , Parallel-Group , Multicenter Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Once-Daily , Intranasal Administration GW685698X Aqueous Nasal Spray 100mcg 2 Weeks Adult Adolescent Subjects ( 12 year age old ) Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis ( SAR )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Must outpatient . Diagnosis SAR . Literate English native language . Exclusion criterion : Have significant concomitant medical condition . Use corticosteroid allergy medication study . Use tobacco product .
